trans-unit.source: Go viral and expand your reach
Set a monthly price for your fans to pay for your exclusive content and services.
Receive offers from other channels to share their content in exchange for points or dollars.
Receive tips from your audience for content they enjoy in points, dollars or Bitcoin.
Not on Minds? Start a channel
To request a new password, enter your username
We have sent an unlock code to your registered email address.
This activity is flagged as spam.
If you wish to appeal, please contact us at info@minds.com.
Have 200 free views on us. Hit post to be boosted.

Support {{id="START_TAG_SPAN" ctype="x-span"}}@{{id="CLOSE_TAG_SPAN" ctype="x-span"}}%1$s by sending them dollars, points or Bitcoin. Once you send them the amount listed in the tiers, you can receive rewards if they are offered. Otherwise, it's a donation.

This is a list of currently trending hashtags. Click the hashtag to see the search results for it. Click on the X next to the tag to hide it. Hidden hashtags won't appear again.
This list was generated %1$s minute(s) ago.
Your Newsfeed contains posts from channels that you are subscribed to, as well as boosted posts from the wider network
The Boostfeed only shows boosted posts from the wider network. To Boost your content, click the Boost icon on the topbar
Open Boost may contain controversial content. By selecting Open, you acknowledge that you are willing to see controversial content.
By selecting Explicit mode, you acknowledge that you are 18+ years of age and are willing to see graphic content, explicit language, and nudity.
This will enable/disable the Boost box on top of your feed from self-rotating.
Plus users may hide Boosts from their newsfeed.
Upgrade to Plus in order to turn off Boost.
Select the categories of content you’d like to see more of
